issue.title: [C++][Python] Add check_metadata argument to Table.equals
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7720](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7720). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we need to use `table.replace_schema_metadata().equals(other)` which is inconvenient. Pass and forward check_metadata argument to the schema equality check.
